questionTitle: Tom is three years old and Daisy is six. Daisy is Tom's ................... sister.
Do you drink tea? I do, but I don't ..................... now, thank you.
She talks as if she .......... all the housework herself, but in fact her two sisters ........... most of it.
Someone offers you some food which you don't want. You say, "....................."
You can have a headache if you are very ........................
You want your friend to wait a moment. You say, ".....................!"
If she ................ (not apologize), he will never speak to her again.
You want some tea . You say, "..................... a cup of tea, please!"
it was late, we decided to take a taxi home.
You repeat a prohibition. You say, "I asked you ..................... touch my computer."
You have finished a meal at a restaurant. You say, "Let's ..................... the bill."
The actors and actresses ...................... very well on the stage.
You are calling your dog. You say, "....................."
The school yard was ........................ with pupils and parents.
This is what you say to a friend on January 1st: "..................... New Year!"
The topic of that discussion was very .......................
The class stands up as you enter the room and you say, ".....................
The ........................ who could fly from trapeze to trapeze attracted the most of all.
You're attending an interview and the interviewer says, "....................."
The opening ceremony will be ........................ in that new stadium.
